column5: Just saw an ad in a Resorts For Sale that Ray's Camps is For Sale.Does anyone know if they sold it yet?

i heard that the previous-to-pete owner (bill kern) son is interested. if this happens, it may be worth going back. i'd like to hear what happens also. - phish (who used to go to ray's back when ray owned it.)

Phish- Thanks for the reply. We would also go back if new owners take it over.Keep us posted.
